com.jfoenix.controls

Class RecursiveTreeItem<T extends RecursiveTreeObject<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.TreeItem<T>
      • com.jfoenix.controls.RecursiveTreeItem<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventTarget

    public class RecursiveTreeItem<T extends RecursiveTreeObject<T>>
extends TreeItem<T>
    RecursiveTreeItem is used along with RecursiveTreeObject to build the data model for the TreeTableView.
    Since:
    2016-03-09
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Shadi Shaheen
